body_content.explanation: A baby or young animal that is weaned has started to eat other food, especially solid food, instead of only its mother's milk:
examples: You may want to sterilize spoons and bowls once your baby is weaned.
Many farmers sell their weaned calves right away.

body_content.explanation: having learned about something and been influenced by it when young:
examples: This style of campaign may be exactly what a generation of young voters weaned on reality TV will respond to.
